<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Analyze Board Meeting"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/board-meeting/analyze"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Start board meeting analysis.

For Level 0-2: Runs synchronously (completes within Cloudflare 100s limit).
For Level 3+: Runs asynchronously, returns immediately with thread_id.
              Client should poll GET /status/\{thread_id\} until complete.

SAC-024: Async mode fixes Cloudflare 100s gateway timeout for large swarms.

Returns:
    thread_id for status polling or resume with decision.
